title: Doomsday Cult Sanctuary Adventure #44
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Initiate's Chamber
rooms.description: A sparse room with stone walls covered in apocalyptic murals depicting fire and destruction. Candles flicker on a small altar, casting dancing shadows. The air smells of incense and old parchment. A single cot sits in the corner, and a wooden chest rests at the foot of the bed.

items.name: initiate's wooden chest
items.description: A plain wooden chest with iron bindings and a simple lock

items.name: cult initiate handbook
items.description: A small book bound in dark leather with a sun symbol on the cover
items.text: Welcome, Initiate. You have joined the Children of the Crimson Dawn. Our founder, Prophet Ezekiel, received the vision at Mount Salvation. Remember: Only through purification can we enter the Eternal Sanctuary when the end comes.

items.name: small prayer altar
items.description: A stone altar with candles and offerings. A hidden compartment is visible in the base.

items.name: tarnished iron key
items.description: A small iron key with a sun symbol etched into the handle

items.name: apocalyptic mural
items.description: A disturbing painting showing the world ending in flames
items.text: The mural depicts the prophecy: 'In the year 2027, the Crimson Dawn shall rise and the faithful shall be saved.' Below it reads: 'The date of salvation: 2027.'

items.name: storage cabinet
items.description: A tall wooden cabinet with two compartments for storing personal items

items.name: prophecy scroll
items.description: A rolled parchment with ornate writing
items.text: The Great Prophecy: In the year two thousand and twenty-seven, the sky shall burn crimson. Only those who dwell in the Eternal Sanctuary shall survive. Prophet Ezekiel has shown us the way.

items.name: ornate brass key
items.description: A decorative brass key with intricate engravings of flames

items.name: heavy wooden door
items.description: A thick door leading to the main sanctuary. It has a brass lock mechanism.

rooms.name: Sanctuary Hall
rooms.description: A vast hall with vaulted ceilings and rows of wooden pews facing a raised platform. Crimson banners hang from the walls, each bearing a golden sun symbol. Stained glass windows filter colored light across the stone floor. A massive bookshelf lines one wall, and a locked door behind the pulpit leads to the inner sanctum.

items.name: preacher's pulpit
items.description: An ornate wooden pulpit carved with religious symbols

items.name: sermon notes
items.description: Handwritten notes for a sermon
items.text: Today's sermon: Remember the three pillars of our faith. Prophet Ezekiel founded our order. Mount Salvation is our holy site. The Eternal Sanctuary awaits the faithful. Purification through fire is our path.

items.name: religious bookshelf
items.description: A tall shelf filled with religious texts and cult doctrine

items.name: book of doctrine
items.description: A thick tome outlining the cult's beliefs
items.text: The Sacred Doctrine: We believe in purification through fire. The world will end, but the faithful shall enter the Eternal Sanctuary. Prophet Ezekiel received his vision at Mount Salvation, our most holy place.

items.name: biography of the founder
items.description: A book about the cult's founder
items.text: Prophet Ezekiel: Born in obscurity, he received a divine vision at Mount Salvation in 1995. He founded the Children of the Crimson Dawn to prepare humanity for the coming apocalypse. His teachings focus on purification and salvation.

items.name: offering collection box
items.description: A locked wooden box for collecting donations

items.name: silver key
items.description: A silver key with a crimson ribbon attached

items.name: ceremonial robes
items.description: Red and gold robes hanging on hooks

items.name: hidden note
items.description: A crumpled note hidden in a robe pocket
items.text: Secret note: The leaders know the truth - there is no prophecy. The 'Eternal Sanctuary' is just the escape tunnel they built for themselves. If you want out, answer the questions at the sanctum door correctly.

items.name: sanctum door
items.description: A reinforced door with a security panel. Three questions are displayed on a screen.

password_questions.question: Who founded our order?
password_questions.hint: Check the cult handbook and the founder's biography

password_questions.question: Where did the founder receive his vision?
password_questions.hint: The doctrine book and biography mention the holy site

password_questions.question: What is our path to salvation?
password_questions.hint: The sermon notes and doctrine book explain this

rooms.name: Hidden Escape Tunnel
rooms.description: You've discovered the truth! A secret tunnel stretches before you, lit by electric lights - modern technology hidden behind the cult's primitive facade. Supply crates line the walls, filled with money and provisions. A ladder leads up to a hatch that opens to the outside world. Fresh air flows down from above.

items.name: supply crates
items.description: Crates filled with cash, food, and survival gear - the leaders' escape supplies

items.name: folder of evidence
items.description: Documents revealing the cult's financial fraud and manipulation
items.text: Bank statements, fake prophecies, and plans to flee with millions in donations. The 'apocalypse' was always a scam. The leaders planned to escape and leave the followers behind.

items.name: metal ladder
items.description: A sturdy ladder leading up to freedom and the outside world

rooms.win_message: You've escaped the Doomsday Cult Sanctuary! As you climb the ladder and emerge into the sunlight, you realize you've uncovered the truth behind the cult's lies. With the evidence folder in hand, you can expose the fraud and help free the other members. The 'prophecy' was nothing but a con, and you've broken free from their control. You win!
